s.text: As noted in yesterday's Chatterbox, if true Willey's story is the worst of Clinton's alleged sexual indiscretions--worse than Lewinsky, worse than Paula Jones.
You now find it completely plausible that she herself smeared her lipstick"--also given them to Steele, with greater success?
You now find it completely plausible that she herself smeared her lipstick"--also given them to Steele, with greater success?
Kathleen Willey got $1 million in insurance money after his death, and apparently didn't give any of it to the poor client whose money was stolen.
